author: Ulfat Shah
text:
Dogs barking wildly.
Confusing silence and unsoothing murmur 
Of the river. Nothing strange however. 
It’s another curfewed night."

author: Ulfat Shah
text:
I'm excited to share my poem from the Current Issue of The Criterion: An International Journal in English https://t.co/VVtJK0kwqV

"Upon pure black canvas of the universe, 
Hued unfriendly blackness; haunted yellow,
Murky and smoky-gray. 
Choir of stars; suffocating air,...

author: Ulfat Shah
text:
"Life is no more than a funeral procession winding towards the grave, 
Its small joys, the flowers of funeral wreaths..." 💛 https://t.co/yaHoiV8xd0
